title: Webhook Debugger & Logger
description: Powerful tool to test, debug, and log incoming webhooks in real-time.

section_urls.title: Endpoint Setup
section_urls.sectionDescription: Automatically create unique, temporary endpoints to capture incoming data.

urlCount.title: Number of URLs
urlCount.description: How many unique webhook URLs to generate for this run (1-10).

retentionHours.title: Retention Period (hours)
retentionHours.description: How long to keep webhook URLs active before auto-deletion (1-72 hours).

section_limits.title: Advanced Safety & Performance
section_limits.sectionDescription: Define payload limits and automated parsing logic for your incoming webhooks.

maxPayloadSize.title: Max Payload Size (Bytes)
maxPayloadSize.description: Maximum allowed size for the request body. Requests exceeding this will be rejected with 413.

enableJSONParsing.title: Enable JSON Parsing
enableJSONParsing.description: If enabled, the Actor will attempt to parse 'application/json' bodies into searchable objects.

section_v2_security.title: v2.0 Security & Access Controls
section_v2_security.sectionDescription: Protect your webhook logs from unauthorized traffic.

authKey.title: Authentication Key
authKey.description: If provided, every request must include '?key=YOUR_KEY' or 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_KEY'.

allowedIps.title: Allowed IPs (Whitelist)
allowedIps.description: Only accept requests from these IP addresses. Leave empty to allow all.

section_v2_response.title: v2.0 Advanced Responses
section_v2_response.sectionDescription: Define exactly how the server should respond to the sender.

defaultResponseCode.title: Response Status Code
defaultResponseCode.description: The default HTTP code to return (200, 201, etc). Can be overridden via ?__status=XXX query.

defaultResponseBody.title: Custom Response Body
defaultResponseBody.description: The payload to return to the sender. Supports JSON/XML string format.

defaultResponseHeaders.title: Custom Response Headers
defaultResponseHeaders.description: A JSON object of headers to include in the response (e.g., {'X-Custom': 'Value'}).

responseDelayMs.title: Response Delay (ms)
responseDelayMs.description: Simulate slow APIs by delaying the response (0-10000ms).

section_v2_workflows.title: v2.0 Advanced Workflows
section_v2_workflows.sectionDescription: Automate where your data goes after it's captured.

forwardUrl.title: HTTP Forwarding URL
forwardUrl.description: Automatically POST every captured request to this destination.

jsonSchema.title: JSON Schema Validation
jsonSchema.description: Paste a JSON Schema to validate incoming payloads. Failed requests return 400.

customScript.title: Custom Transformation Script
customScript.description: JavaScript code to transform the event object before saving. Provided arguments: { event, req }.

testAndExit.title: Test and Exit
testAndExit.description: If enabled, the Actor will exit immediately after successful initialization. Used for automated QA tests.
